duties_responsibilities.duty: Create solutions to meet the needs of customers
Generate Sales Proposals and create quotes
Ensure application specifications are received per standard work, and resolve any issues with customers
Evaluate and launch purchase orders to create manufacturing projects
Collaborate cross-functionally to obtain information relative to orders and quotes
Observe all safety standards and ensure department compliance
Utilize a Daily ERP System such as Salesforce, CRM, etc.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in engineering or equivalent (Master's preferred)
